CastAway:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

CastAway:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
CastAway:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

CastAway:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

CastAway:OptimismRelic.NAME: Optimism
CastAway:OptimismRelic.FLAVOUR: You lost everything, but are much better at keeping and valuing things now.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !G!% Extra gold. Items in the shop cost !G!% less.

CastAway:NothingIsLostRelic.NAME: Nothing is Lost
CastAway:NothingIsLostRelic.FLAVOUR: Even if you think you lost something, is it really gone?
DESCRIPTIONS: When exhausting a card, have a 50% chance to add a copy into your discard pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

CastAway:IronFistRelic.NAME: Iron Fist
CastAway:IronFistRelic.FLAVOUR: For every strike, there is an equal response.
DESCRIPTIONS: When playing an attack, draw a card.

CastAway:LeftHandedRelic.NAME: Left Handed
CastAway:LeftHandedRelic.FLAVOUR: Are you sure you are doing the right thing?
DESCRIPTIONS: When you discard, draw a card.

CastAway:HallucinationRelic.NAME: Hallucination
CastAway:HallucinationRelic.FLAVOUR: Are you sure what you see is real?
DESCRIPTIONS: The first rare card you draw each combat gets duplicated. NL It costs 0 until played.

CastAway:IndecisivenessRelic.NAME: Indecisiveness
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 [E] at the start of your turn. The first time you exhaust a card each combat, lose !D! HP.
